archimate:Goal.name: CSA Cloud Controls Matrix
archimate:Goal.documentation:
The Cloud Security Alliance's CCM is a cybersecurity control framework for cloud computing. It's designed to provide fundamental security principles to guide cloud vendors and to assist prospective cloud customers in assessing the overall security risk of a cloud provider.
Cloud Security Alliance is a non-profit organization dedicated to defining and raising awareness of best practices to help ensure a secure cloud computing environment. Cloud Controls Matrix is a framework from the Cloud Security Alliance, providing fundamental security principles to guide cloud vendors and assist cloud customers in assessing the security risk of a cloud provider.
